snippet.title: Vibe Check - Carbonflesh Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam

Betrayed, weakened and in the hands of his enemies, a hacker is on his terminal train ride. One way trip, one way ticket. Imprisoned inside the "Spear", he fights through grit and determination, to reclaim what was once rightfully his.

Carbonflesh is about planning, and your ability to persevere against an ever changing, dynamic environment. Amass and manage your resources, but remember: The only resource that can never be replenished is time.
